Protocols/Storage.html#/s:9PureCache7Sto.name: read()
Protocols/Storage.html#/s:9PureCache7Sto.abstract: Get the storage destination content as a key-value pairs.

Protocols/Storage.html#/s:9PureCache7Sto.name: write(_:)
Protocols/Storage.html#/s:9PureCache7Sto.abstract: Replace the content of the storage destination with the passed key-value pairs.

Protocols/Storage.html.name: Storage
Protocols/Storage.html.abstract: A generic protocol to read and write key-value pairs.

Classes/PureCache.html#/s:9PureCacheAAC5.abstract: Get the count of keys that are currently stored in the cache.

Classes/PureCache.html#/s:9PureCacheAAC8.name: setValue(_:forKey:)

Classes/PureCache.html.name: PureCache
Classes/PureCache.html.abstract: A simple, fast and easy-to-use cache system for Codable values.
